channel.title: Make certain areas pvp
channel.description:
Hi, sorry for the nooby question but I cannot figure out how to make it so pvp is allowed within certain coordinates, or just everywhere except for a bank. Using a 562 server, thanks
Edit: I looked around in the code and found it, if anyone is wondering, look for SafeZone() in Entity.java and change the coordinates for the true/false if else statements to make it safe/dangerous

item.title: Make certain areas pvp

@soapeater3 wrote:

Hi, sorry for the nooby question but I cannot figure out how to make it so pvp is allowed within certain coordinates, or just everywhere except for a bank. Using a 562 server, thanks

Edit:
I looked around in the code and found it, if anyone is wondering, look for SafeZone() in Entity.java and change the coordinates for the true/false if else statements to make it safe/dangerous
